tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Saptarshi Mukherjee is *** *** **** ******* **  *****.
Located in Kolkata he is a skilled implantologist, who leaves no stones unturned to provide you with the right medical treatment.

Whats commendable is that he being such a ************ * ******* professional, he is extremely humble & down to earth.

We can all learn a lesson from him on how to handle ones customers (read patients).

He gives topmost priority to his patient, making them feel comfortable & at ease.
He listens to every patient with care & provides best in class treatment, customised for every patient.

He is always available on phone & also ensures to reply to every whats app message personally.

Doctors like him help Kolkata to be a priority city to depend upon for effective  dental treatment at an affordable pricing üëçüëåüëå‚úåÔ∏èüôåüåüüåüüåüüåü

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Single Sitting,Surgical Extractions of Teeth,
review:
It was my first visit to The Dentist . After having severe tooth ache for a week I somehow managed to get an appointment on an emergency basis . 
I was very scared when Doctor told me that I need to extract one tooth and a root canal treatment on the same day . Thanks to him I really had a painless extraction and successful root canal treatment . 
He always checked on how I am doing after the treatment which I have not seen in any doctor. It was one of the cleanest dental clinic I have visited .  God bless him with abundance . 
I would recommend Dr . Saptarshi Mukherjee to everyone looking for solution for any kind of dental problems. He has good knowledge and all facilities for one stop solution . üëç
reply_text: Really appreciate your feedback. Thank you for your patience during the procedure and your kind review. Hope to be of service to you in your future needs. Take care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fixed Partial Denture (FPD),RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Surgical Tooth Extraction,Zirconia Crowns,
review:
Exceptional Dental clinic.
Not the biggest but cleanest and best for a treatment of an aged person like me. I am 70rs old. 
Went to replace my missing teeth.** **** * *** *** **** ********* *** *** ****** * *** ****** ****
I can chew very well now and enjoy the foods that I like.
Thanks to Dr. Saptarshi Mukherjee for his kind behavior and painless treatment* ** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** *** *** trust me I have been to many dentists earlier.
My son and my wife are to be under his more than able hands. Thank you to all and specially Dr. Mukherjee. I can eat well now and only for him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
One particular instance has touched me was Dr. Mukherji had gone to Sri Lanka for attending a conference and I was in serious problem of bleeding from my gums. I was also not in my hometown Kolkata. I had sent him a WhatsApp asking for his advice. He was kind enough to reply to my message immediately and not only so he phoned me several times to find about my situation. He also advised the other on phone what has to be done. 
He always checks on me how I am doing after attending him which I have not seen in any doctor. I am 84 years old.
God bless him abundantly.
reply_text:
Your blessings are all we need... Glad to be of service to you...
Thanks..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ********* ** *** ****** * *** * ****** *** *** ***** ********* ** ** *** *** *** *** * *** ** ********** ****** ** ***** I was asked to go to look for strong painkillers at 12.15am, and with great difficulty i found one *** **** *** ****** ***** *** *** ******** *** ******* *** ****** *** ** *** **** *** ** ** *** ***** ***** * *** ******* but then after 2 days I was called to do crowning but to my horror he started without sedation on my gums and again I yelled. ******** ******* *** a complete loss of money. He charges extremely high *** *** ***** *** ***** *** **** **** *** **** ***** *** ********* *****Not at all recommended
reply_text:
Mr. Diwan, I appreciate your feedback. But let me get a few facts straight with you before your nonchalantly defame our clinic. 
You came to us because you had pain or is it you thought we provide head massages here?
You had a condition and we tried our best to repair the damages you already came with.
We tried to save your tooth before doing RCT which would have let your tooth dead. The infection was bad enough for the treatment to not work. For which you were not charged. Do you had a free treatment which you are complaining about.
Now after the 2nd sitting you had no pain as you reported on watsapp. This review is after your 2nd sitting btw.
No comes the cost part.
Your brother who is an old patient of mine called and confirmed my charges before you came into our clinic for the treatment and you were fine with it as well.
Now I remember you being furious on him for paying the consulting charge of Rs. 500 which he missed to mention to you. I have that on watsapp as well.
All I can say is that we dont work magic spells here as doctor. We try to cure whats ailing in you.
It takes time to heal. You did not damage your tooth in 1 day, how do you expect it to be fine in a day or two.
Losing temper is your condition as mentioned by your brother as well. Please dont use it in an inappropriate manner. As far as I remember you went out happy with the treatment. If it was for the Rs.500 extra for consultation you had to pay, I am sorry it was such a huge loss for you to pay a doctor his visiting fees.
I mentioned it to your brother that it will be refunded to you as and when you wish for it. 
Thank you for visiting though.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Complete satisfied with his prescription. I did earlier visit few more dentists of Apolo however the way they did explain and even did filling all were temporary cure.However this time type of damage occured in each tooth was explained. Implant was so convenient and painless.Recovery was so fast with bare minimum medicines.
reply_text: I really appreciate you feedback. Glad to be of service to you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Saptarshi Mukherjee's treatment with ultimate cordiality was marvellous along with staff. His humility and friendliness are outstanding which are seen rarely. Above all, he possesses lot of knowledge and experience. 
Let Iswar bless him with all success in life. 
-- Prof. Sita Ram Behani, Ex V Principal and H. O. D. 
                                           Freelance Journalist

Very good infrastructure and amenities. **** **** * **** *** ** ******** Had my full mouth fixed teeth done with Dr. Saptarshi Mukherjee. He has very safe hands and my experience was very comfortable and without pain. 
Friendly staffs and safest dentist in town. What more to ask for. Thanks for giving my mouth a new lifeline.I can eat my desired food now. Recommended highly.

I dont think there is a better and more efficient Implantologist in Kolkata than Dr. Saptarshi Mukherjee.
He has God's blessings on his hands.
Painless experience. Quick healing and no swelling.
He is an honest hard working dentist with best clinical setup. I am more than happy to be treated by him.
My entire family is in his safe and secure hands.
A dentist with friendly attitude. God bless.
Highly recommended "The Dentist".

Recommended for all, especially aged patients just for doctor's  behavior towards you. Smiling now for sure..Thanks Dr. Mukherjee.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: reason for health issues is not explained as well costlier treatment suggest ****** **** ***** ************
reply_text:
Thanknyou for you response.
But as per the prescription your are a vhronic smoker since past 6yrs.
Is that not a good enough reson mentioned to you by your Dentist for the lesions you are having.
As per medications are concerned, you have been having some homeopathy medicine for this for a few months now. It was advice to get the treatment first and then medicines will be prescribed accordingly.
We dont entertain hypochondriac patients with the medicine of there choice and will.
If you think treatment is expensive here. Thats your choice as per your finances. All good things come at a fair cost. Dont expect treatment to be free and by popping some pills in your mouth you will be ok.
Thank you for visiting.
